definition: Lasting for a very short time
The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
A sound that is sweet and smooth, pleasing to hear
Too great or extreme to be expressed or described in words
A pleasant smell that frequently accompanies the first rain after a long period of warm, dry weather
The state of being infatuated or obsessed with another person
The realization that each random passerby is living a life as vivid and complex as your own
The strange wistfulness of used bookstores
The state or situation of being alone
A natural electrical phenomenon characterized by the appearance of streamers of reddish or greenish light in the sky
